Choose the humorous alteration that alters the title of the movie or musical artist.
Identify the whimsical modification that 'ruins' the title of the movie or the name of the musical artist.
Select the humorous twist that alters the original title of the movie or musical artist.
Choose the humorous alteration that distorts the title of the movie or the name of the musical artist.
Locate the amusing alteration that 'spoils' the title of the film or musical artist.
